content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### First Furnace at position (0, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (0, 0)) with a fuel inventory containing 18 coal.

### Second Furnace at position (2, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (2, 0)) with a fuel inventory containing 6 coal.

### Iron Gear Wheel Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position unspecified) that crafts iron gear wheels.

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors related to inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace has enough space in its inventory before attempting to insert items. The furnace can only hold a limited number of items (50 items total).
- Check the inventory of the furnace before inserting items to avoid attempting to insert when it is full.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Ensure that there are enough items in the furnace to extract before attempting to extract. If the furnace is empty, the extraction will fail.

### Errors when crafting items
- Monitor your inventory levels to ensure you have enough raw materials available before crafting items.
